name: Show All Draft Posts And Pages
author: Golam Dostogir

sections.description: Show draft posts and page is a plugin where you can see all your entire drafts posts and pages and auto save posts through admin dashboard and also if you want you can show draft posts as a upcoming post in your website with just drag and drop widget.you can edit them can delete them with just a easy click
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘Show_draft_posts_pages’ folder to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings->Show all drafts Post
  4. For showing draft posts as upcoming Post goto widgets section and simply drag and drop the ‘Draft as upcoming’ widget
